headline: International Flavors (IFF) Q4 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: The headline numbers for International Flavors (IFF) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2024, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: International Flavors (IFF) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: International Flavors (IFF) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 24.36% and 3.94%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: International Flavors (IFF) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
raw.summary: International Flavors (IFF) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 24.36% and 3.94%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: International Flavors: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had a loss of 18 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 97 cents per share. The results beat Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: International Flavors: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had a loss of 18 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 97 cents per share. The results beat Wall Street expectations.

headline: IFF Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Results
summary: NEW YORK, February 18, 2025--International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. (NYSE: IFF) reported financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2024.
